entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [EPIC] `dotnet user-jwts` in .NET 8 #46263
  • ArgumentException in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Analyzers.RouteHandlers.RouteHandlerAnalyzer #46261
    Backlog
  • Blazor WASM: Assertion error and uncaught promise in AuthorizationService.ts #46257
  • Google authentication not working #46256
  • Allow abbreviated namespaces in components #46254

Closed

  • Upgraded to net6.0 recently and noticing references of packages like Microsoft.VisualBasic in the using statements #46175
  • Reduce build warnings to zero in 3.1 #31461
    3.1.x
  • Azure B2C logout endpoint does not redirect to the post_logout_redirect_uri when logout performed in YARP middleware #46104
  • Update TFM to net8.0 #45492
    8.0-preview1
  • Simplify 2.1 build #45506
    2.1.39
  • Unskip Source Build job #46191
    8.0-preview2
  • Unable to Build from Source #46219
  • MacOS/BlazorServer/HTTPS/.NET7.0: Protocol unsupported, no secure connection, ERR_SSL_VERSION_OR_CIPHER_MISMATCH after changes #46146
  • RegexRouteConstraint should use Compiled Regex #46154
    8.0-preview2
  • Blazor Custom elements not working with .net 7 Blazor Server #46091
    Discussions
  • Unable to debug Blazor from Vscode #46222
  • Configure parameter binding #43386
    Discussions
  • HttpContext property of HttpContextAccessor is null in the ClientCertificateValidation callback of HttpsConnectionAdapterOptions #46052
  • Blazor .NET 7 CustomElements two-way binding/calls not working #46111
  • DictionaryModelBinder not working with null default value in .Net 7 #45502
    8.0-preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding ILLink.Substituions.xml EmbeddedResource #46265
    area-runtime
  • Install VS Community by default #46262
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Multiple accept loops in named pipes transport #46259
    area-runtime
  • Change IsTfaEnabled to IsTwoFactorEnabledAsync #46258
    area-identity, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix DictionaryModelBinder null reference issue #45515
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Make it easy to produce a 2.1 build without prodcon #46197
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.39
  • Add RegexOptions.Compiled option to RegexRouteConstraint #46192
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Convert UTF16 to UTF 8 #46245
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview1
  • Prevent merging PRs which have CI checks run a week+ ago #46177
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [Named Pipe] Check for pipe broken on WaitConnectionAsync #46230
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Improve IFormCollection.Items documentation #44372
    area-runtime
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 2.1.x
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup #46225
    area-runtime
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • Clarify some comments on RateLimiterOptionsExtensions #44855
    area-runtime
  • Improve IIS error when wrong application path #46249
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • consider escaped commas in LDAP distinguished name #45649
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [AOT] Enable analysis and annotate Http.Results #46082
    area-web-frameworks
  • Don't check in blazor.*.js files #45883
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Complete inner Pipewriter in HttpLoggingMiddleware #39989
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Input components two way binding + InputBase handling of unparsable inputs #40326
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, .NET 8 Planning
  • Update CODEOWNERS #40664
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix flaky HTTP/2 test #41181
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    Perf, area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add FieldIdentifier Indexer handling #41628
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve pfx support for CertificateConfigLoader #43719
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove premature QuicListener.IsSupported check #44755
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, pending-ci-rerun
  • ApiAuthorizationDbContext.cs missing ServerSideSessions Patch #45145
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update SauceLabs Connection version #45242
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update OIDC sample #45349
    area-security, pending-ci-rerun
  • Allow injection of Gson or JsonParser (or both) when constructing JsonHubProtocol #45555
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/7.0] Don't throw exception for unresolved type #46078
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Add support for JSON output to more `user-jwts` commands #45431
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks
